articles.title: Ukraine targets Russian soldiers threatening Europe's largest nuclear power plant - Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine is targeting Russian soldiers who shoot at Europe's largest nuclear power station or use it as a base to shoot from, as G7 nations, fearing a nuclear catastrophe, called on Moscow to withdraw its forces from the plant.
articles.content: KYIV, Aug 14 (Reuters) - Ukraine is targeting Russian soldiers who shoot at Europe's largest nuclear power station or use it as a base to shoot from, as G7 nations, fearing a nuclear catastrophe, cal… [+6001 chars]

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Ukraine says it will target Russian soldiers at Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant - The Guardian
articles.description: Volodymyr Zelenskiy vows attacks on troops based in Europe’s largest nuclear power station and those who fire upon the site
articles.content: Ukraines president has said his forces will target Russian soldiers who shoot at Europes largest nuclear power station or use it as a base from which to launch attacks, as G7 nations called on Moscow… [+4258 chars]
